title: American Horror Story 8: Apocalypse // Promo: The End
author: American Horror Story 10
comment: I feel like this is going to be one of the best seasons. The concept about the apocalypse is amazing
Chernobyl? Radioactive trailer, amusement park, apocalypse.

I need it to be September already the suspense is KILLING 🔪🗡️🔪 me ... I love my AHS I am finished with murder house and I am half way through asylum only to start coven my favorite season of all ... Best show on TV ... Ryan Murphy and Brian Falchuck are God damn geniuses
I'm so excited to see how this all turns out. In the Hotel season finale, everything seems fine in the future.
